EN.profile_image_submitted_desc: Your profile image has been submitted for approval!
EN.what_happens_next_desc:
â€¢ The bot owner will review your image
â€¢ You'll receive a DM when it's approved or rejected
â€¢ Once approved, your image will appear on your profile
EN.note_desc: Please ensure your image shows a valid Avatar Realms account screenshot.

EN.file_too_large: âŒ Image file too large! Please upload an image smaller than 10MB.
EN.download_failed: âŒ Failed to download image. Please try again.
EN.save_failed: âŒ Failed to save image. Please try again.
EN.processing_error: âŒ An error occurred while processing your image. Please try again.
EN.profile_approved_desc: Your profile image has been approved and is now active!
EN.next_steps_desc: Use `/profile` to view your profile with the new image.
EN.profile_rejected_desc:
Your profile image was not approved.

**Reason:** {reason}
EN.what_to_do_desc: Please submit a new image using `/setprofile` with a valid Avatar Realms account screenshot.
EN.no_pending_desc: There are no pending approvals to clear.

EN.approval_expired_desc: Your profile image approval request has expired (24 hours).

â€¢ Your approval request was not reviewed within 24 hours
â€¢ The temporary file has been cleaned up

EN.error_notifying: Error notifying user of approval result: {error}
EN.error_timeout: Error notifying user of approval timeout: {error}
